title: Undead Creature Voice Clip Collection Vol. I
description: A set of 130 undead creature sounds.

technicalDetails:
Features: 130 stereo .wav sound effects.


Files Included:


Banshee Scream 1-10


Drowned Zombie Voice 1-7

Female Zombie Moan 1-12

Female Zombie Saying Brain 1-4

Male Zombie Groan 37-53


Horror Ghoul Monster Death 1-4

Horror Ghoul Monster Moan 1-9

Horror Ghoul Monster Pain 1-6

Horror Ghoul Monster Voice 1-6


Ghostly Death Knight Pain 1-2

Ghostly Death Knight Voice: Fear The Might Of The Damned, I Am Eternal, I Am Unstoppable, I Will Break You, I Will End You, I Will Feast On Your Souls, I Will Listen, No, Soon, Tremble Mortals, What is Dead Cannot Die, You Are Doomed, You Will Die, Your Insolence Will Be Your End



Male Ghost Voice: As You Wish, Can't Fulfill This Wish, Death, Destroy Them, Enemies Flee, Flay Them, Master No, Master, Rise With Us, They Are No More, They Escape, They Flee In Terror, They Run Away 1-2, They Run In Fear, We Are At Your Command, We Are Bound, We Are Yours, We Bury Them, We Cannot, We Listen, We Submit, We Must Kill, We Obey, Yes Master, Your Will Be Done


Male Ghost Whisper - Are You Scared, Come To Me, Curse Upon You, Darkness Consume You, Embrace The Shadow, Hear My Voice, I Am Unbound, I Will Show You The Way, I'm Banished, Not So Fast, Rise My Minions To Battle, Succumb To Your Nightmares, Vanished Into Oblivion, Your Weapons Are Useless



Number of Audio Waves: 130

Number of Audio Cues: 130

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7:18

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
